section.title: ActivityContextInterface Extension
section.para: This simple extension to JAIN SLEE 1.1 introduces org.mobicents.slee.ActivityContextInterfaceExt interface, which extends javax.slee.ActivityContextInterface with methods to retrieve the timers and names bound to the ACI.

listitem.para: Retrieves the IDs of timers currently set which are related to the ACI.
Retrieves the names currently bound to the ACI.
